message.content:
cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IT, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper discusses locally-biased graph algorithms, which are primarily related to graph theory and data science. The optimization approach mentioned in the title suggests that the paper may also be related to optimization. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also mentions statistical theory, which suggests that it may be related to machine learning and statistics, leading to the sub-categories cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), and cs.IT (Information Theory). Finally, the paper may also be related to computational complexity, leading to the sub-category cs.CC (Computational Complexity).
